DOC.brief_summary: the purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of topical Finasteride in the treatment of idiopathic hirsutism
DOC.brief_title: Topical Finasteride in the Treatment of Idiopathic Hirsutism
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic hirsutism which is defined as normal levels of androgens and normal ovulation Normal serum prolactin Pregnancy Simultaneous use of other drugs for the treatment of hirsutism
